lyrics.stanza: O glorious Christ revealed, Myself I fully yield; I long to run to You, To kiss Your lips anew, God's house is my desire, Bethel, my dream realized; A dwelling for the lonely, A feast in Bethany. Forgiveness, love and care, Real kingdom life we share; Peace and joy and righteousness, The City filled with praise. Campus, homes, and nations, Whole earth propagation; Glory and praise to His name, To all the earth proclaim.
Lord, I would offer myself, Build Your organic Body; Open homes, Gain the young, Shepherd men, Perfect them, Bring in the glorious church, Hasten, Lord, Your return.
